title: Single of The Week: Born Ruffians – What To Say
body:
For this weeks single, we are going for something fresh, with the latest single from Candian indie band **Born Ruffians**, _What To Say_ .

This is first single from their forthcoming album **Say It**, out 31st of June, on Warp Records. The instruments are simple and edgy, while the song is completed by some beautifully introvert vocals from singer Luke LaLonde.

Below is a link to the video for the track, which features a quite incredible usage of an oscillator.

[Born Ruffians – What To Say](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-tFDF1rwUO8)

[Pre-order _Say It_](http://bleep.com/index.php?page=release_details&releaseid=23796)

[Myspace](http://www.myspace.com/bornruffians)
